pageProduct.name: Avene Physiolift Smoothing Night Balm 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Smoothing regenerating night balm for all skin type in lack of firmness with deep wrinkles.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic.For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes. If tingling occurs, reduce the number of application by half. Do not use when pregnant.

Common Uses

Smoothing regenerating night balm which increases the skin firmness, reduces pronounced wrinkles, replumps the skin and fills deep furrows, moisturizes detoxyfies and brightens the skin.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). ISOHEXADECANE. DIMETHICONE. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. CETYL ALCOHOL. GLYCERIN. CETEARYL ALCOHOL. PENTYLENE GLYCOL. GLYCERYL STEARATE. PEG-100 STEARATE. 1,2-HEXANEDIOL. TOCOPHERYL ACETATE. ASCOPHYLLUM NODOSUM EXTRACT. CETEARETH-33. DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). HESPERIDIN METHYL CHALCONE. PVP. RED 33 (CI 17200). RETINAL. SODIUM HYALURONATE. WATER (AQUA).  XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the evening all over the face except the eye contour, onto neck and neckline, after cleansing, a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water and applying Physiolift serum.
